# Architecture and diagrams

## `metapage` <-> `metaframe` initialization via [window.postMessage](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Window/postMessage)

This process can only start when the `metapage` consumer adds the child `metaframe`.iframe elements to the DOM (iframes elements only start loading when added to the DOM).

Adding the iframes to the DOM is outside the control of this library.

[![](https://mermaid.ink/img/eyJjb2RlIjoic2VxdWVuY2VEaWFncmFtXG4gICAgTm90ZSByaWdodCBvZiBNZXRhcGFnZTogV2FpdCB1bnRpbCBNZXRhcGFnZSBwYWdlIGxvYWRzXG4gICAgTm90ZSByaWdodCBvZiBNZXRhcGFnZTogVGhlbiBzdGFydCBsaXN0ZW5pbmcgdG8gcG9zdE1lc3NhZ2VcbiAgICBNZXRhcGFnZS0---)](https://mermaid-js.github.io/mermaid-live-editor/#/edit/eyJjb2RlIjoic2VxdWVuY2VEaWFncmFtXG4gICAgTm90ZSByaWdodCBvZiBNZXRhcGFnZTogV2FpdCB1bnRpbCBNZXRhcGFnZSBwYWdlIGxvYWRzXG4gICAgTm90ZSByaWdodCBvZiBNZXRhcGFnZTogVGhlbiBzdGFydCBsaXN0ZW5pbmcgdG8gcG9zdE1lc3NhZ2VcbiAgICBNZXRhcGFnZS0---)
